etomica.interfacial

Class WriteConfigurationInterfacial

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.action.WriteConfiguration
      • etomica.interfacial.WriteConfigurationInterfacial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction

    public class WriteConfigurationInterfacial
extends WriteConfiguration
    Dumps a box's configuration to a file. The coordinates are written in a format that can be read in by ConfigurationFile. The output file has a "pos_new" extension, which should be renamed to "pos" for use with ConfigurationFile.
